original_text: and the people of Israel said to them, “Would that we had died by the hand of the Lord in the land of Egypt, when we sat by the meat pots and ate bread to the full, for you have brought us out into this wilderness to kill this whole assembly with hunger.”
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 그들에게 이르되 우리가 애굽 땅에서 고기 가마 곁에 앉아 있던 때와 떡을 배불리 먹던 때에 여호와의 손에 죽었더라면 좋았을 것을 너희가 이 광야로 우리를 인도해 내어 이 온 회중이 주려 죽게 하는도다

sentences.original_text: and the people of Israel said to them
Would that we had died by the hand of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 주의 손에 죽었더라면 좋았을 것을

sentences.original_text: when we sat by the meat pots
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 고기 가마 곁에 앉아 있을 때

sentences.original_text: and ate bread to the full
for you have brought us out
